parameter.name: graph_bar_width
parameter.documentation: The width of a bar in a bar chart

parameter.name: graph_bar_justification
parameter.documentation: the bar will be centered on the value, or left, right justify : useful for plotting any accumulated fields

parameter.name: graph_bar_style
parameter.documentation: If candlestick, a line will be drawn at the position with 2 small perpendicular lines at top and bottom

parameter.name: graph_bar_line_style
parameter.documentation: Line Style of the Bar Border

parameter.name: graph_bar_line_colour
parameter.documentation: The colour of the the Bar Border

parameter.name: graph_bar_colour
parameter.documentation: The colour of the interiors of bars

parameter.name: graph_bar_clipping
parameter.documentation: whether or not to clip the bar if they go outside the view area.

parameter.name: graph_bar_annotation
parameter.documentation: add annotation on the top box : List of strings to use

parameter.name: graph_bar_minimum_value
parameter.documentation: If set, defines the bottom of the bar
